A4.text: four AFL / AFC championships: 1967, 1976, 1980, and 2002; and two Super Bowl championships: 1976 (XI) and 1980 (XV).

A5.text: The Raiders won two Super Bowl championships: 1976 (XI) and 1980 (XV).

A6.text: Super Bowl XVIII was an American football game played on January 22, 1984, at Tampa Stadium ... to determine the National Football League (NFL) champion for the 1983 season.

A7.text: As of the 2024 season, this is the Raiders' most recent Super Bowl championship, and it was also the only time that a Los Angeles–based team had won the Super Bowl until their then cross‑town rival Los Angeles Rams won Super Bowl LVI at SoFi Stadium in Inglewood, California.
